skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Although lacking the finesse of Elven magics, the sorceries of the north are no less potent, for they channel furious, Daemonic power.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5
Melee defence: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The swamp will rise again, its inhabitants enjoying the blessings of the Dark Gods once more.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The same enchanted mist that obscures Fimir Balefiend dwellings can also be conjured to confound and horrify would-be attackers on the battlefield.

effects.description: Armour: +10
Physical resistance: 5%

skillTree.localised_description: They can see the Winds of Magic's ebb and flow, enabling them to make the best use of the magical power available.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 15%
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: From the mists they came, unseen until it was too late. And in the mist they vanished again, once their bloody work was done.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

Ambush success chance: +15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Ever the nurturing mother, Kroll's love for her children has no bounds, as she devours foes, all those she considers her progeny - Fimir, Bog Octopi and others - are fed the regurgigated remains and revitalised.

effects.description: Ability: "Mother of a Thousand Young"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: Kroll has survived for aeons, and the Fimir claim she's as old as the world itself. Whatever the truth, the many weapons and trinkets of would-be slayers that cover her form can attest to her endurance.

effects.description: Armour: +20
Unit mass: +20%
Missile resistance: 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The grip of Kroll's colossal tentacles has such strenght that it can crush armour, flesh and bones in a matter of seconds. No foe who has been trapped in her embrace has lived to tell the tale.

effects.description: Enables "Constriction" contact effect (damage over time)
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +50

skillTree.localised_description: In the presence of Kroll both her eartthly children - the Bog Octopi - and the other supernatural denizens of the Marsh fight with greater cunning and ferocity, for now they're guided not be instinct alone, but by the will of the Great Mother.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +16 for Bog Octopus units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Bog Octopus units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 for Chaos Furies, Swamp Daemons, Bog Octopus, Fen Beasts, and Daemonomaniacs units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Kroll has been known to implant her magical eggs in the bodies of her still living prey,  eggs which then grow quickly feeding on the soul essence of the victim, ending with a Bog Octopus hatchling busting out of the doomed victim.

effects.description: Ability: "Broodmother"

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Kroll will inoculate one of her spawn into a random enemy unit with low health, destroying it instantly

skillTree.localised_description: Whatever the truth of her origins, it is a fact that Kroll is now a creature of the Empyrean, and that worship and sacrifices dedicated to her greatly empower her phyiscal manifestation. Beholden to none of the Four, Kroll plans to eventually reach her own apotheosis as goddess of the Fimir...

effects.description: Wound recovery time: -3 turns
Attribute: Immune to Contact Effects

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

effects.description: Ability: "Fulcrum of Worship"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: No matter how far away, none can escape the Kiss of the Deep, nor breathe again with lungs full of seawater.

skillTree.localised_description: As surely as night follows day, when the mist descends, death isn't far behind.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Once the mighty Kraken's tentacles take hold, only the toughest can fight their way free.

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates  lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Crude they may be, the skill and might of the Fimir Warriors makes them terrifying opponents.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Boglars, Shearls, Fimm Deathquests, and Fimm Warriors units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Boglars, Shearls, Fimm Deathquests, and Fimm Warriors units

Weapon strength: +6% for Boglars, Shearls, Fimm Deathquests, and Fimm Warriors units

	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Boglars, Shearls, Fimm Deathquests, and Fimm Warriors units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Fimir aren't the fastest creatures, but they know about the value of mobility on the battlefield. Therefore they tame the faster, corrupted and dangerous creatures of their swampland homes to gain a tactical advantage.

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for Moor Hounds, Nuckelavees, and Bog Beast Raiders units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Moor Hounds, Nuckelavees, and Bog Beast Raiders units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for Moor Hounds, Nuckelavees, and Bog Beast Raiders units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Moor Hounds, Nuckelavees, and Bog Beast Raiders units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Moor Hounds, Nuckelavees, and Bog Beast Raiders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The larger and stronger Fimir are used as shock troops, with devastating effect on the enemy.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Fimm Mistmors, and Fianna Fimm units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Fimm Mistmors, and Fianna Fimm units

Weapon strength: +12% for Fimm Mistmors, and Fianna Fimm units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Fimir aren't the only monsters inhabiting swamps. Weaker or small-minded monsters are subjugated and utilized to increase the numbers of the Fimir armies.

Melee attack: +4 for Chaos Furies, Swamp Daemons, and Fen Beasts units

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It's hard to aim with only one eye, but the Fimir still use limited numbers of ranged troops.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Shearl Scouts, Balefiend Apprentices, and Fog-Shrine of Balor units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Shearl Scouts, Balefiend Apprentices, and Fog-Shrine of Balor units

skillTree.localised_description: Fimir are often accompanied by bigger, more terrifying swamp dwellers. Make no mistake though, the Fimir are the masters of these creatures and will use them with ruthless cunning.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Bog Octopus and Daemonomaniacs units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Bog Octopus and Daemonomaniacs units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Bog Octopus, and Daemonomaniacs units

Ability: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: Few can hope to overcome the veterans of the warrior caste in battle. Luckily they are low in number.

Armour: +12 for Boglars, Shearls, Fimm Deathquests, Fimm Warriors, and Fianna Fimm units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Starved monsters, driven by hatred and hunger. They will fight with reckless abandon against the foes of the Fimir.

skillTree.localised_description: Fimir are not famous for their hit and run tactics, partly because only a few who encounter them live to tell the tale.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Nothing brings fear to the heart like the trembling of the ground these abominations cause with every step.

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.

effects.description: Ability: "Fight or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

effects.description:
Income from sacking settlements: +3%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +8%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5%
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10%
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The bleak, brutal landscape of the far north breeds bloody, warlike tribes in thrall to Chaos' delicious, twisted power.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith amongst the Fimir can rival sacrifice of captured slaves; a dark and twisted offering in honour of Mud-Father Fimul and his children.

effects.description:
Increased experience gain: +10% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)
Slaves gained from battles: +5%

Increased experience gain: +15% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)
Slaves gained from battles: +10%

Increased experience gain: +20% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enemy battle reinforcement time: +25%
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

skillTree.localised_description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +6%
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +16%
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +30%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Something strange - something no scholar really wishes to discover - governs who dies and who lives in the warlike northern wastes.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -3%
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -6%
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -9%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

factionEffects.localised_description: The Tendrils of Doom are a fanatic sect of Fimir, dedicated to worshipping Kroll the All-Mother not as a Daemon Princess, but as the one and true Fimir goddess. They seek to make her apotheosis a reality, hoping they will be rewarded with rulersihp over the world when she turns it into a cursed bog for all eternity.

effects.description: (all armies)

Erect temples in Kroll's name at province capitals, to increase her Mass, Armour and Weapon strength by +5% each time along with powerful army bonuses and positive diplomatic relations with Chaos Worshipping factions, Dark Elves and Greenskins.
Upkeep: -15% for Bog Octopus, Fog-Shrine of Balor, and Daemonomaniacs units

Underworld Sea travel time: -1
	(factionwide)

Growth: +15
	(all provinces)
Casualty replenishment rate: +10%

Immune to High Seas, Reef and Storm attrition
	(all armies)

Sea Lanes journey duration: -1 turns
	(factionwide)
Spell: "Spirit Leech"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A being as ancient as the world possessing great malice and intellect, Kroll is a Daemon Princess unaligned to any of the Great Powers, and worshipped as mother of the Bog Octopi and ruler of the cursed bogs by the Fimir.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] adds immortal

Upkeep: -50% for Bog Octopus units
	(Lord's army)
Melee attack: +15 when fighting at sea

Enemy leadership: -5
	(local region)

Missile resistance: 10% for Chaos Furies, Swamp Daemons, Bog Octopi, Fen Beasts, and Daemonomaniacs units
	(Lord's army)
